goal.en: "This course aims to help students gain insight into how brands can be managed and how it is applied by practitioners. As it is for graduate student level, students are expected to be more active in participating in the whole teaching process. So, students are all requested to get highly involved in subject discussion in the class. In order to give students more understanding on how practitioners develop brands, 2 field practitioner will be invited to give speeches to participating students. Also, students are requested to compose a brand strategy proposal for a brand to enhance its brand equity. It is expected that by the end of this program, students are equipped with required background knowledge as how to develop brands in the real world."

14 0518 1) Chp. 13: Managing brands over time, 2) Quiz for Chp. 13 Group 6

16 0601 Brand proposal presentation Teams 1 & 2
17 0608 Brand proposal presentation Teams 3 & 4
18 0615 Speech (Silicon Power Computer & Communications) 18:30-20:30"
